name: yourls
description: YOURLS is a self-hosted URL shortener that generates short links with optional custom keywords and stats. It supports plugins, APIs, and multiple users, offering a private alternative to public shortening services.
features: Custom keywords: Create memorable short URLs with custom keywords instead of random character strings.
Click statistics: Track clicks, referrers, and geographic data for each shortened link to measure engagement.
Private or public: Run as a private shortener for personal use or open it to the public with optional registration.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with community plugins for features like QR codes, previews, and integrations.
API access: Shorten URLs programmatically using the REST API for automation and third-party integrations.
Bookmarklet: Install a browser bookmarklet to shorten the current page URL with one click.
Multi-user support: Create accounts for team members with individual statistics and link management.
Link management: Edit, delete, or update destination URLs for existing short links without changing the short URL.
Search functionality: Find shortened links quickly by searching keywords, destinations, or creation dates.
Password protection: Restrict access to specific short links with password requirements for sensitive content.
Duplicate detection: Automatically reuse existing short URLs when the same long URL is submitted multiple times.
Database flexibility: Choose between MySQL and other database backends for storage based on your infrastructure.
